title: Let's Have A Positive Attitude
itunes:title: Let's Have A Positive Attitude
description:
Did you know that your attitude can affect your success? When we dwell on negative thoughts, a negative attitude can spread to every area of our lives. Choose instead to drown out the negative voices and overlook offenses. When you keep an attitude of faith, God will fight your battles for you.Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
